summary: This is a brief email exchange regarding Jeffrey Epstein, where the sender indicates they will have reports tomorrow but currently have preliminary interview information. The email is dated August 1, 2019, shortly after Epstein's arrest in July 2019.

events.title: Email exchange about Epstein reports
events.description: An email exchange where the sender states they will have reports tomorrow but currently have preliminary information from interviews regarding Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: Email dated August 1, 2019, discussing Jeffrey Epstein.
Sender references having preliminary information from interviews.
Sender states full reports will be available the following day.
Communication occurs shortly after Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
Document is part of the EFTA00014582.pdf file in Data Set 8.
